name: Dual of the Sticks
description:
2D 1 v 1 fighting game with rag-doll physics. Beat your opponent with your sword until his health is 0. But make sure to avoid the snake boss.  Use the boundaries and snake boss to out think and out strategist your opponent

First to 3 rounds Wins the game

Game uses Xbox controllers and uses the left analog to control player

A project made in my Game-a-Week class at LIU Post. 

Prompt: Games to be watched
